price: 190.Diggah Qaranwaa kee Baaxô ginooy Bar kee Laqo ittal Abta ciggiiliyyi Yallih inkittinaanee kee kay dudda tascassee Astooti edde tan Qaafiyatah yan kas-le marah.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī khalqi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri laāyātin li-ulī al-albābi
